page.title: 08Ombersley Church
page.content: The church is{155 years old.}Canon Doyle,the rector, can fit 300 people downstairs and 300 people in the {galleries.}There are six bells in the bell tower.Some of the bells go back to the{sixteen hundreds}because they hung in the old church,which was beginning to fall down.The only part of the old church that is left is the {old chancel}which is a separate building sometimes used for small services.Lots of people use the church in the week like bellringers, embroiderers and flower arrangers, but unless there is someone to supervise, the church is kept locked in case of vandals.Canon Doyle is rector of Ombersley and Doverdale parishes.He has been a clergyman for 32 years.He has a seat in the Cathedral in Worcester,it is number 27.He and his wife live in the beautiful rectory.
